thread.title: Motsoeneng the 'chosen one' for SABC post - DA
thread.title_full: Motsoeneng the 'chosen one' for SABC post - DA | News24

author: news24.com
title: Motsoeneng the 'chosen one' for SABC post - DA
text:
Cape Town – Hlaudi Motsoeneng was appointed as the SABC’s COO without the position being advertised or other candidates being considered, the Democratic Alliance argued in the Western Cape High Court on Tuesday.
The court was hearing an application by the party to have his appointment as Chief Operations Officer set aside.
DA lawyer Anton Katz said Motsoeneng, or “the chosen one”, was also not interviewed for the position.
“That fact on its own is sufficient to render the appointment of Mr Motsoeneng unlawful and invalid,” he told Judge Dennis Davis.
